simpleSort.c is a bubble sort that counts operations.

$ ./simpleSort.exe 4 3 78 5 4 2 56 1 887 5 34 1 99875 4 3 5 2
1 3 78 5 4 2 56 1 887 5 34 2 99875 4 3 5 4
1 1 78 5 4 2 56 2 887 5 34 3 99875 4 3 5 4
1 1 2 5 4 2 56 3 887 5 34 3 99875 4 4 5 78
1 1 2 2 4 3 56 3 887 5 34 4 99875 4 5 5 78
1 1 2 2 3 3 56 4 887 5 34 4 99875 4 5 5 78
1 1 2 2 3 3 56 4 887 5 34 4 99875 4 5 5 78
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 887 5 34 4 99875 5 5 56 78
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 887 5 34 4 99875 5 5 56 78
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 5 34 5 99875 5 56 78 887
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 5 34 5 99875 5 56 78 887
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 5 99875 34 56 78 887
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 5 99875 34 56 78 887
Number Outter   : 13
Number of Inner : 130
Number of swaps : 22
1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 5 34 56 78 887 99875
